metadata.title: CVE-2021-26252 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in htmldoc in v1.9.12. Heap buffer overflow inpspdf_prepare_page(),in ps-pdf.cxx may lead to execute arbitrary code anddenial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-26252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.11-4
htmldoc-common - 1.9.11-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.11-4').
